item.title: Tooltip # 6 :: Filtering JSON arrays with jq
item.description: In this short clip, we'll look at using jq to filter JSON arrays. Requirements: jq: https://stedolan.github.io/jq/ ğŸ“: ğŸ‘‰ Tested on MacOS Mojave but should work on earlier versions and all flavours of Linux ğŸ‘‰ Although jq is really powerful but watch out for over using it. It is probably more easier to achieve the same thing in a proper language.
